content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation and Leave Policy\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The purpose of vacation is to provide employees with an opportunity to rest, relax and recharge throughout the year. To this end, employees are expected to plan and use all of their earned vacation in each entitlement year. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The vacation policy is based on a calendar year and will be granted according to the Dominican labor legislation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Leaves of Absence\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees will be entitled to leaves of absence in accordance with Dominican legislation, which encompasses maternity leave, sick leave, bereavement leave, among others. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Other Personal Leave Of Absence Needs\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the event you require a leave of absence that would not qualify under any of the options established by Dominican labor legislation, you can make such a request, in writing, to People Operations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All leave requests are to be made as far in advance as possible, when knowledge of the need first arises. Further documentation may be required to assess the request. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any accrued and unused paid time off must be used prior to approval of an unpaid leave. Once you have used all available applicable paid days off, any further approved time will be without pay, unless you are otherwise eligible for a state or company provided disability pay benefit.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An approved leave may or may not impact benefit eligibility, dependent on the type of leave, and the duration.  Speak with People Operations to understand whether the requested leave will impact benefits (examples: grocery coupons, savings fund contributions, etc.). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is required that all personal leaves under this section have an expected return to work date and that you keep your supervisor and People Operations updated as to any changes in status or expected return date. You are expected to keep a regular communication interval with your supervisor during your leave. You must contact your supervisor and People Operations immediately if you know you will not be returning or if your situation changes. Your supervisor must be contacted prior to your expected return to work date to discuss your return to work.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Failure to return to work as scheduled from an approved leave of absence or to inform your supervisor of an acceptable reason for not returning as scheduled will be considered a voluntary resignation. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
